sentence0.sentece_text: To investigate its chronic toxicity, mosquitofish (Gambusia holbrooki) adults and fry were exposed to aqueous sodium perchlorate at 1, 10, and 100mg/L, and growth and reproductive performance (fecundity, eggs/embryos mass, and gonadosomatic index [GSI]) were determined.

sentence1.sentece_text: The LC50 of sodium perchlorate was 404 mg/L .
